data.name: OCPS Skyward+ v2.3 (Dark theme)
data.description:
Save your beautiful eyes from the blinding white background and ancient design of Skyward with my custom dark theme CSS style. Additional changes are included to modernize the site. (such as removed the borders on Gradebook, Schedule, etc.)

Enjoy!

------ Credits ------
Dark background: "Global dark style" by stormi @ userstyles.org

Remastered iconsets:
"Silk Icons" by FamFamFam (Mark James) @ http://famfamfam.com/lab/icons/silk/
"Farm-Fresh" by FatCow Web Hosting @ https://www.fatcow.com/free-icons

data.name: Money Dashboard Dark
data.description:
Staying on top of your money is easy... on the eyes
A dark theme for UK-based personal finance and budgeting site Money Dashboard.

data.name: Google 検索ツールをサイドバーへ
data.description:
2012年11月21日の仕様変更で、検索ツールが折りたたまれてしまった問題を解決します。 検索ツールを常に展開し、以前のようにサイドバーから利用できるようにします。

───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────

This style resolves the issue of the search tool being minimized and moved to the top due to Google's recent design change on November 21, 2012. Always expands the search tool and moves it back to the left side (legacy feature).

data.name: 我的小满
Reddit ( Hide Logo and Coins Button )
data.description:
Hide Reddit logo and Coins button. I use Reddit at work for work related things, so I don't want other people to think I'm browsing Reddit instead of working. Hiding the Reddit logo makes the subreddit logo more evident and if anyone's watching my screen they wont misunderstand what I'm looking at.

I also found myself wanting this style at home since the Coins button is a big eyesore and Reddit looks much cleaner with dark mode and without that big yellow button.
